description:
She is the half-American, half-Japanese lead singer of Trapnest who writes the lyrics for Trapnest`s songs. Though her name is often romanized as "Reira," she is actually named "Layla" after the hit song by Eric Clapton.
Layla grew up with Takumi and she still has deep unanswered feelings for him.
name: Serizawa Layla
